TextBlock.Text: SOLANUM: So.. your Sun is diying and you.. connected with the one of statue? Someone also connected from Giant's deep, do you know who is it?
SOLANUM: Oh my bad, I forgot that you can't respond, I mean I can't translate so whatever .. let's just move on..
SOLANUM: I just realized that we're running out of time.. Seems like I'll back on Quantum Moon after the reset, that's how it works?
SOLANUM: or... can we escape? Core is charged so we can try to get out of here before the supernova explosion.
SOLANUM: I saw the Vessel from your vision, what if it's still working? I need to find out! Find me there.
